message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SD

The paper discusses the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper specifically focuses on the problem of state aliasing, which is a common issue in structured prediction tasks. Based on this information, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), as the paper deals with natural language processing tasks. Additionally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.SD (Software Engineering) are also possible sub-categories, as the paper discusses the use of RNNs and their training methods.
